hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Bomb Bag#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.
